019package com.plotsquared.bukkit.listener;
020
021import com.plotsquared.bukkit.player.BukkitPlayer;
022import com.plotsquared.bukkit.util.BukkitUtil;
023import com.plotsquared.core.location.Location;
024import com.plotsquared.core.permissions.Permission;
025import com.plotsquared.core.player.PlotPlayer;
026import com.plotsquared.core.plot.Plot;
027import com.plotsquared.core.plot.flag.implementations.ForcefieldFlag;
028import com.plotsquared.core.util.Permissions;
029import org.bukkit.entity.Player;
030import org.bukkit.util.Vector;
031
032import java.util.HashSet;
033import java.util.Set;
034import java.util.UUID;
035
036@SuppressWarnings("unused")
037public class ForceFieldListener {
038
039    private static Set<PlotPlayer<?>> getNearbyPlayers(Player player, Plot plot) {
040        Set<PlotPlayer<?>> players = new HashSet<>();
041        for (Player nearPlayer : player.getNearbyEntities(5d, 5d, 5d).stream()
042                .filter(entity -> entity instanceof Player)
043                .map(entity -> (Player) entity)
044                .toList()
045        ) {
046            PlotPlayer<?> plotPlayer;
047            if ((plotPlayer = BukkitUtil.adapt(nearPlayer)) == null || !plot
048                    .equals(plotPlayer.getCurrentPlot())) {
049                continue;
050            }
051            if (!plot.isAdded(plotPlayer.getUUID())) {
052                players.add(plotPlayer);
053            }
054        }
055        return players;
056    }
057
058    private static PlotPlayer<?> hasNearbyPermitted(Player player, Plot plot) {
059        for (Player nearPlayer : player.getNearbyEntities(5d, 5d, 5d).stream()
060                .filter(entity -> entity instanceof Player)
061                .map(entity -> (Player) entity)
062                .toList()
063        ) {
064            PlotPlayer<?> plotPlayer;
065            if ((plotPlayer = BukkitUtil.adapt(nearPlayer)) == null || !plot
066                    .equals(plotPlayer.getCurrentPlot())) {
067                continue;
068            }
069            if (plot.isAdded(plotPlayer.getUUID())) {
070                return plotPlayer;
071            }
072        }
073        return null;
074    }
075
076    private static Vector calculateVelocity(PlotPlayer<?> player, PlotPlayer<?> e) {
077        Location playerLocation = player.getLocationFull();
078        Location oPlayerLocation = e.getLocation();
079        double playerX = playerLocation.getX();
080        double playerY = playerLocation.getY();
081        double playerZ = playerLocation.getZ();
082        double oPlayerX = oPlayerLocation.getX();
083        double oPlayerY = oPlayerLocation.getY();
084        double oPlayerZ = oPlayerLocation.getZ();
085        double x = 0d;
086        if (playerX < oPlayerX) {
087            x = 1.0d;
088        } else if (playerX > oPlayerX) {
089            x = -1.0d;
090        }
091        double y = 0d;
092        if (playerY < oPlayerY) {
093            y = 0.5d;
094        } else if (playerY > oPlayerY) {
095            y = -0.5d;
096        }
097        double z = 0d;
098        if (playerZ < oPlayerZ) {
099            z = 1.0d;
100        } else if (playerZ > oPlayerZ) {
101            z = -1.0d;
102        }
103        return new Vector(x, y, z);
104    }
105
106    public static void handleForcefield(Player player, PlotPlayer<?> plotPlayer, Plot plot) {
107        if (plot.getFlag(ForcefieldFlag.class)) {
108            UUID uuid = plotPlayer.getUUID();
109            if (plot.isAdded(uuid)) {
110                Set<PlotPlayer<?>> players = getNearbyPlayers(player, plot);
111                for (PlotPlayer<?> oPlayer : players) {
112                    if (!Permissions
113                            .hasPermission(oPlayer, Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_ENTRY_FORCEFIELD)) {
114                        ((BukkitPlayer) oPlayer).player
115                                .setVelocity(calculateVelocity(plotPlayer, oPlayer));
116                    }
117                }
118            } else {
119                PlotPlayer<?> oPlayer = hasNearbyPermitted(player, plot);
120                if (oPlayer == null) {
121                    return;
122                }
123                if (!Permissions
124                        .hasPermission(plotPlayer, Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_ENTRY_FORCEFIELD)) {
125                    player.setVelocity(calculateVelocity(oPlayer, plotPlayer));
126                }
127            }
128        }
129    }
130
131}
